author: entertainment.ie
title: Hotel Deal of the Week: Castleknock Hotel & Country Club, Dublin
text:
Castleknock Hotel & Country Club, Dublin
Fantastic 10TH BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION Offer: €170pps – 1 night Bed & Breakfast with a 4-course Dinner, including a glass of Prosecco, in the award-winning Park Restaurant.
Also includes the following treats; post-dinner cocktail in the Avenue Bar; a luxurious Chocolate Plate; delicious Afternoon Tea for two; a relaxing back, neck & shoulder massage followed by a refreshing fruit plate in the post-treatment relaxation area.
Guests also enjoy an upgrade to a newly decorated Executive Room and late checkout!
This is a midweek & weekend offer, valid until 23 December 2015.
www.castleknockhotel.com
